game_description: The doors of Aimtropolis are open and we are bringing you a taste of it in this Demo. In Aimtropolis DEMO you will face the challenge that this VR shooter/Arcade game brings to you. Your goal, get the highest score in each level and get on the top of the ranking. Make yourself worth of the crown going through our different worlds with an environment inspired on western, medieval, WWII, Pirates and cyberpunk. What are you waiting for? Face the challenge straight away or practice with our training grounds to improve your aim and prepare for the challenge.
review_1: Aimtropolis tries to help you with you accuracy and and shooting skills in this fun arcade type style adventure. You get to go through several levels with different environments. Each level has different tasks and goals to make sure you are getting the most fun and accuracy to hit your targets. I enjoyed this game very much for how simple it is while still learning how to control your recoil and reaction time! Video Review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uDyRtl9o1wY
review_2: I was tired of aim trainers that are boring and ugly, this game is beutiful to the eye, has many scenarios, a great OST, and is very fast and dynamic. This is only a demo, but they keep updating it everyweek, and it's very good. I'm 26 and my nephew is 12, and we love playing it and trying to beat each other's score! I recommend it ^^
review_3: Just played your new demo üëç your doing great keep up the good work.
review_4: The scoreboard allows you to challenge your friends to see who makes the max score
review_5: Really fun to play and try to beat your friends, the mini-games are very enjoyable because they are quick and intuitive. Waiting for the full version to come out!
